title: Aspire LF Top and Jungler ( High Plat+)
body:
Hi Guys,

Aspire are after a experienced Top laner and Jungler who have a strong knowledge about the game.

We are looking for players who are available 5 days a week, these being Sunday-Thursday. On these days we will be doing reviews and scrimming once the teams synergy has vastly improved. 

Currently the 3 of us have a wealth of experience from either a coaching role or playing role within the 5's scene. We are after players who take criticism well and are able to remain calm if the team gets behind.

We are preferably looking for High Platinum- Diamond players to complete the roster. And players who know the meta and can obviously play those champs.

Please either add me or post here and we can discuss further.

replies.body:
Jungle main. d2 last season before i went overseas and got LP decay. Currently P1 after climbing from bloody gold 3.

85% winrate last 20 games. Impeccable knowledge of current meta and great shot caller. add me IGN BlueLiquor
Can i try out for Jungle, IGN Mr Anderson currently Diamond 5
Jungler here, practicing top and mid champs atm. IGN Bloodrave, Current rank Platinum I.
